properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches is forecast during the
next 48 hours across much of the Tombigbee River basin...and a flood
warning remains in effect along the Tombigbee.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* from Saturday morning until further notice...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 7:15 AM Thursday the stage was 53.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday morning and continue
to rise to near 76.4 feet by Tuesday morning. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 77 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected. Widespread flooding of lowlands
and some cabins and camps along the river will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
